message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. Given its potential worth to you, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,400,000. I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,300,000. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer and understand your desire to work within a budget.  While that price doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,350,000?
